result.name: voa-residential-private-rented-sector-prs-achieved-rents_1
result.notes: Sample of landlords and agents (not statistically drawn). The data is collected for three prime statutory purposes each delivering national policy:  1. Housing Benefit subsidy for Residential Private Rented Sector (PRS) claims  2. Setting the rates for Local Housing Allowance - the publication of these rates allows claimants to find a home within their budget  3. Determination and Registration of Fair Rent for regulated tenancies. Updated: regularly.

organization.name: valuation-office-agency
organization.title: Valuation Office Agency
organization.description:
The Valuation Office Agency (VOA) provides the government with the valuations and property advice required to support taxation and benefits. It compiles and maintains the business rating and council tax valuation lists for England and Wales, and delivers a range of valuation and surveying services to over 4,000 public sector bodies.

VOA is an executive agency of HM Revenue & Customs

http://www.voa.gov.uk/corporate/index.html
